div.span: School Closure Information

p.style: color: #272727; font-family: adrianna, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: #f7f7f7

span.p: This is an update based on the school closure information we received from the Governor. We have been anticipating this closure and wanted to address several consistently asked questions. We understand that this email probably doesn’t answer all of your questions, but we wanted to provide information in manageable chunks. Please send your additional questions to Janelle King at [email protected]. We will provide additional updates.

p.style: color: #272727; font-family: adrianna, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; background-color: #f7f7f7

h3.a: Say Hello to Your Bus Driver!

div.span: On Thursday, April 30th, beginning at 3:00 pm, the District Bus Drivers are going to be driving their usual bus routes.
The Kindergarten Screening originally scheduled for June 3, 2020 at GES will now be held on July 28, 2020.

In past years, many Granville students have performed in the Central Ohio Youth Ballet's performance of The Nutcracker. Auditions will be held August 22nd for this year's performance at The Midland. For more details:
See below for an updated announcement regarding the school closure.
How can students go about obtaining a work permit under Ohio’s Minor Labor Laws if schools are closed?

h3.a: Granville Athletic Boosters looking for volunteers

div.span: Specifically, the Boosters are searching for a Vice President and two Board Members. Below are the descriptions for each position. Interested parent should email or call Janell Rogers at (678) 416-1774. [email protected]

h3.a: Agenda posted for Regular Board Meeting April 20 2020

div.span: The Agenda for the Regular Board Meeting to bne held April 20, 2020 has been posted.
Granville Schools is hiring a Special Education Academic Support ESY positions.
The Press Release for the April 20, 2020 Board Meeting has been posted.

h3.a: Granville Community Foundation is here to help in these difficult times

div.span: If your family is experiencing difficultes due to the pandemic, GCF has resources to help.
Superintendent Jeff Brown sent out the following update to families March 27 2020.

h3.a: Granville Schools is hiring a Middle School Physical Education Teacher

div.span: Granville Schools is hiring a Middle School PE Teacher for the 2020-2021 school year.

h3.a: Granville Schools is hiring a High School Math Teacher

div.span: Granville Schools is hiring a high school mathematics teacher to start in the 2020-2021 school year.

h3.a: Granville Schools is hiring a Head Girls Basketball Coach

div.span: Granville Schools is hiring a Head Girls Basketball Coach for Granville High School for the 2020-2021 school year.

h3.a: Granville Schools is hiring a JV Cheerleading Coach

div.span: Granville Schools is hiring a JV Cheerleading Coach for the 20-21 school year. For details or to apply:

At this time, we have suspended our service of doing background checks/fingerprinting for employees of Granville Schools until further notice. If you have questions, please contact Janelle King at [email protected] We apologize for the inconvenience.

h3.a: Granville Schools hiring Head Boys Basketball Coach

div.span: Granville Schools is looking to hire a high school Head Boys Basketball Coach for the 20-21 school year.
2020 Granville Athletics Hall of Fame Nominations can be made using the link below. Nominations are due by May 1st.

Beginning March 16th, no registration appointments will be scheduled until at least May 1st. If you are registering your child for school for the 2020-2021 school year, you may complete the online registration through Final Forms now but your registration appointment with Lisa Fitch will be done at a later date in this school year.
